reviews.review_msg: CMNS 354.This professor is amazing at both teaching students and helping them understand every single part of the topics. I was diagnosed with a disease and he was very understandable like no other and he taught me a lesson. His interest for the course is astonishing and he cares for the success of the students, his grading was very fair.

At the start of the semester Amir told the class, "if you work hard, we will fly together", and we flew. I absolutely hated math and stats and dreaded this course but Amir drives you through it and as long as you attend all the lectures, tutorials and do all the quizzes, coursework and decently in the midterm & final you'll be fine.
Really cool guy, very friendly and laid back! His class was very informative and his personality made you want to attend!
